tests.name: ALK Rearrangement Analysis
tests.description: Identifies ALK rearrangements  used in non-small cell lung cancer treatment.

tests.name: Antinuclear Antibody (ANA) Test
tests.description: Detects autoantibodies that target nuclear components often used in diagnosing autoimmune diseases.

tests.name: BRCA1/BRCA2 Mutation Analysis
tests.description: Detects mutations in the BRCA1 and BRCA2 genes  used in breast and ovarian cancer screening.

tests.name: Basic Metabolic Panel (BMP)
tests.description: Evaluates electrolytes kidney function and blood sugar levels.

tests.name: Blood Culture
tests.description: Detects bloodstream infections by identifying bacteria or fungi in blood samples.

tests.name: CT Angiography of the Chest
tests.description: Dedicated CT angiogram for coronary arteries or pulmonary embolism. Requires rapid IV contrast administration.

tests.name: CT Colonography (Virtual Colonoscopy)
tests.description: Low-dose CT for colorectal cancer screening. Requires bowel preparation; no sedation needed.

tests.name: CT of the Facial Bones
tests.description: CT of the maxillofacial region (e.g.  trauma  dental pathology). Multiplanar reconstructions often requested.

tests.name: CT of the Kidneys
tests.description: Dedicated renal CT with IV contrast (e.g.  hydronephrosis  renal masses). Includes ureters and bladder if extended.

tests.name: CT of the Lower Extremity
tests.description: CT of the leg  knee  or hip (e.g.  osteomyelitis  stress fractures). Specify joint or region (e.g.  femur  tibia).

tests.name: CT of the Pancreas
tests.description: Multiphase pancreatic CT with IV contrast (e.g.  pancreatitis  cancer). Portal venous phase critical for tumor assessment.

tests.name: CT of the Sinuses
tests.description: CT of the paranasal sinuses (e.g.  sinusitis  polyps). Coronal and axial views standard.

tests.name: CT of the Upper Extremity
tests.description: CT of the arm  elbow  or shoulder (e.g.  fracture  tumor). Specify joint or region (e.g.  humerus  scapula).

tests.name: Complete Blood Count (CBC)
tests.description: Measures red blood cells white blood cells platelets hemoglobin and hematocrit levels.

tests.name: Comprehensive Metabolic Panel (CMP)
tests.description: Expands on BMP by adding liver function tests and lipid profile.

tests.name: Contrast-enhanced CT of the Abdomen
tests.description: CT of the abdomen with oral and IV contrast (e.g.  bowel obstruction). Enhanced visualization of organs and vasculature.

tests.name: Contrast-enhanced CT of the Chest
tests.description: CT of the chest with IV contrast (e.g.  pulmonary embolism  coronary CTA). Includes heart  lungs  and major vessels.

tests.name: Contrast-enhanced CT of the Head
tests.description: Axial CT scan of the brain with intravenous contrast. Used for detecting tumors  infections  or vascular abnormalities.

tests.name: Contrast-enhanced CT of the Pelvis
tests.description: CT of the pelvis with IV contrast (e.g.  ovarian cysts  prostate evaluation). Often combined with abdominal CT for comprehensive imaging.

tests.name: Culture and Sensitivity Testing
tests.description: Identifies bacteria or fungi in a sample and determines antibiotic susceptibility.
